name: Tower Rangers
description:
Help your hero escape ominous labyrinths and dungeons! Fight the forces of evil on your way up the dark tower to save a princess in this amazing puzzle game combined with a roguelike RPG!

Fearing an ages-old prophecy of his eventual defeat, an evil sorcerer has held the princess hostage in his dark tower. You, brave adventurer, must now climb the tower and attempt to rescue the princess from the ruthless sorcerer's clutches.

Strategize and find the best way to climb the cursed castle! Manage your HP wisely as you attempt to clear every level. Look out for traps and uncover the best path through every floor. Keep a keen eye out for items and equipment that will help you battle vile monsters and undead creatures blocking the way to the exit. Unlock other classes, like Knight, Thief, Templar, and Mage!

Features

- Awesome roguelike RPG and puzzle game mechanics!
- Colorful, nostalgic retro video game graphics
- Earn diamonds from each stage to unlock classes: Knight, Archer, Mage, and Barbarian!
- Play through 40 unique and challenging floors. More levels coming soon!
- Defeat ghouls and monsters to clear the paths, unlock doors and access the portal for your escape
- Players can repeat the levels for unlimited number of times
- Pick up weapons, armor, keys, and potions that will help you keep alive!
- Compete with friends through Facebook!

** Please note that this free app contains optional paid content that can be purchased with real money
to enhance the gaming experience. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings. **"
